description:
Join One of Udemy's Leading Entrepreneurship Communities!

Course v2.0 Released December 2015

You can free yourself to pursue your dreams, travel more, and put yourself on a path to financial independence by being a smart Airbnb host. We welcome you into our house to share what we've learned while using Airbnb to successfully quit our day jobs and build a thriving business.

Launch Your Own Airbnb Operation and Create Personal Freedom

  • Build Your Hosting Strategy
  • Avoid the Mistakes We Made!
  • Set Yourself Up for Success
  • Attract the Best Airbnb Guests
  • Learn Our Communication Hacks (they're Critical!)

Save Time, Make More Money, and Get Great Reviews

Brian and Joe, the founders of Airbnb, had a dream and couldn't pay their rent. So they created a site where they could rent spots on three air mattresses in their small apartment to guests. Ultimately, they were able to use this money to launch a business that's now worth $20 billion and is helping people like you get the money they need to create the lives they want. For some people, Airbnb is hobby and for others, it's a path to freedom.

While Airbnb is an amazing opportunity for entrepreneurs, freelancers, and hosts everywhere, there are some big lessons that we've learned becoming some of the platform's most engaged hosts. You'll learn how to intelligently set up your space, create a profile that guests trust, a listing that they find attractive, and field inquires from guests all over the world. Most importantly, you'll learn how to successfully work with people in your space.

Come on into our house and get started!
title: Airbnb: Our Insider Tips and Tricks for Successful Hosting
instructors: Davis Jones, Team Eazl, Team Eazl
